pr_title: DB-9895: remove first write token during wal replay

timeline.bodyText: So, if I understand correctly, we will remove the FIRST_WRITE_TOKEN cell from the list of WAL edits, therefore it will be written to the HFile causing a proper deletion to happen when compaction kicks in, right?
timeline.author: hatyo

timeline.bodyText:
Please add a comment here explaining why this is needed, or at least a pointer to
DB-9895 and add the full explanation there.
timeline.author: dgomezferro

replies.bodyText: I had a hard time reproducing this manually. I can only verify that the token is removed and rows are not purged during WAL replay. Will prepare a parcel to run Stephanie's test on cloud
replies.author: jyuanca

timeline.message: DB-9895: remove first write token during wal replay
